-thEyaqtyathEya#tiq traya# iqmE lOqkA EqBya Eqvaina#M ~MlOqkEBya#H Samayati tiqsra utta#rAq Ahu#tIrjuhOtiq ShaT thsaM pa#dyantEq ShaD vA Ruqtava# RuqtuBi#rEqvaina(gm)# Samayatiq yada#nupariqkrAma#M juhuqyAda#ntaravacAqriNa(gm)# ruqdraM ku#ryAqdathOq KalvA#huqH kasyAqM ~MvA&ha# diqSi ruqdraH kasyAqM ~MvEtya#nupariqkrAma#mEqva 
hO#taqvya#-mapa#rivargamEqvaina(gm)# SamayatyEq - [  ] 12
